channel.title: FreedomScape [ Join Now ] New, 317 , Customs , Lots of Freedom
channel.description:
[center][b]SERVER: ONLINE[/b] Players Needed, Just started re-hosting. [size=14pt]Drop Party When There Is 5 then 10 then 15 Players Online.[/size] Double XP than usual, Special Starter Package. Hurry. [b]Players Needed, Just started re-hosting.[/b] Invite Friends, Lets Get This Server Going.[/center] Hello Guys and Gals, this is Tyler. I'm here to inform you that I have a RSPS, that is back online. Some people may know of it, but many may not. The Server is called FreedomScape. FreedomScape is the newest server name, it was changed due to the last server name, not many liked so I changed it. So for those that is concerned. But FreedomScape is a RuneScape Private Server. Back in the day it wasn't as popular to many people. But as you may know, RitzScape, it is similar to RitzScape but it has my own updates and some extra stuff. Not to make to could amazing or anything, but it is a really good server. I have had people online doing beta testing and such. Most bugs have been fixed. Some suggestions have been accepted, still being accepted. FreedomScape is just a little server to play in your free time, enjoy the game, and meet new people. ------------------------------- Recent Updates: > DOUBLE EXP than normal. ~> ( First Couple Weeks To Get The Game Started ) > 1 million coin credits for every starter to be spend at ::shops ~> ( First Couple Weeks To Get The Game Started ) > New Starter Package ( Mime Wear And Demon Wings ) ------------------------------- Features: • Training Areas • Many Locations • Good Community • Great Economy • Lots of Freedom • New Home • Quick Chat Skills • Coin Credits • Colored Wings • Custom Weapons • Custom Equipment • 99 Skill Level ( Can Buy Trimmed Capes ) • 135 Max Skill Level ( Can Buy Untrimmed Capes ) • ::talking ( Uses 2 coin credits and can talk to the world ) • Lots of commands for players ( Type ::commands ) • Bosses ( Armadyl , Bandos , Zamorak , & Saradomin ) @ ::monsters or Click 'Monster Portals' In Quest Tab. • Metal Dragons ( Drops ) @ Click 'Monster Portals' In Quest Tab. • Colored Dragons ( Drops ) @ Click 'Monster Portals' In Quest Tab. • & Much More ------------------------------- Pictures: [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200000.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200001.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200002.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200003.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200004.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200005.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200006.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200007.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200008.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200009.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200010.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200011.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200012.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200013.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200014.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200015.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200016.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200017.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200018.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200019.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200021.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200022.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200023.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200024.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200026.png[/img] [img]http://freedom-scape.webs.com/photos/Fubergen%200027.png[/img] ------------------------------- Why you should play this server? I'm not telling you to play this server, I'm just suggesting it. It is totally up to you. All i recommend is that you give it a try, better to try and not like it than to not know if you like it or not. Up to you. If so read the section below. Maybe I'll see you around. ------------------------------- Go to the website that will be located below this paragraph, Sign up and become a member so I have an estimate of players that would to be apart of the community. At the website below you will be able to get a lot of updates and information. ------------------------------- Client problems: If you get something like this when you run the client:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: client : Unsu pported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknow n Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
All you have to do is download the latest version of Java, because it uses the latest version I have used. If have problems just send me a message to my email: ------------------------------- Thank you all for taking the time to go through this. I hope some of you were interested. If not I'm sorry, I'm sure there is a rsps out there that will fit you. Have fun and Enjoy the community.

item.title: FreedomScape [ Join Now ] New, 317 , Customs , Lots of Freedom
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Changing your server’s name does not warrant posting a new thread. You can just edit the topic’s name and continue using the same advertisement thread.

Read full topic

item.title: FreedomScape [ Join Now ] New, 317 , Customs , Lots of Freedom
item.dc:creator: @TyPrizza TyPrizza
item.description:
@TyPrizza wrote:

[center]SERVER: ONLINE
Players Needed, Just started re-hosting.
[size=14pt]Drop Party When There Is 5 then 10 then 15 Players Online.[/size]
Double XP than usual, Special Starter Package. Hurry.
Players Needed, Just started re-hosting.
Invite Friends, Lets Get This Server Going.[/center]

Hello Guys and Gals, this is Tyler.

I’m here to inform you that I have a RSPS, that is back online. Some people may know of it, but many may not. The Server is called FreedomScape. FreedomScape is the newest server name, it was changed due to the last server name, not many liked so I changed it. So for those that is concerned. But FreedomScape is a RuneScape Private Server. Back in the day it wasn’t as popular to many people. But as you may know, RitzScape, it is similar to RitzScape but it has my own updates and some extra stuff. Not to make to could amazing or anything, but it is a really good server. I have had people online doing beta testing and such. Most bugs have been fixed. Some suggestions have been accepted, still being accepted.

FreedomScape is just a little server to play in your free time, enjoy the game, and meet new people.

Recent Updates: > DOUBLE EXP than normal.
~> ( First Couple Weeks To Get The Game Started )
> 1 million coin credits for every starter to be spend at ::shops
~> ( First Couple Weeks To Get The Game Started )
> New Starter Package ( Mime Wear And Demon Wings )

Features:

• Training Areas
• Many Locations
• Good Community
• Great Economy
• Lots of Freedom
• New Home
• Quick Chat Skills
• Coin Credits
• Colored Wings
• Custom Weapons
• Custom Equipment
• 99 Skill Level ( Can Buy Trimmed Capes )
• 135 Max Skill Level ( Can Buy Untrimmed Capes )
• ::talking ( Uses 2 coin credits and can talk to the world )
• Lots of commands for players ( Type ::commands )
• Bosses ( Armadyl , Bandos , Zamorak , & Saradomin ) @ ::monsters or Click ‘Monster Portals’ In Quest Tab.
• Metal Dragons ( Drops ) @ Click ‘Monster Portals’ In Quest Tab.
• Colored Dragons ( Drops ) @ Click ‘Monster Portals’ In Quest Tab.
• & Much More

Pictures:


























Why you should play this server?

I’m not telling you to play this server, I’m just suggesting it. It is totally up to you. All i recommend is that you give it a try, better to try and not like it than to not know if you like it or not. Up to you. If so read the section below. Maybe I’ll see you around.

Go to the website that will be located below this paragraph, Sign up and become a member so I have an estimate of players that would to be apart of the community. At the website below you will be able to get a lot of updates and information.

Client problems:

If you get something like this when you run the client:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: client : Unsu pported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknow n Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

All you have to do is download the latest version of Java,
because it uses the latest version I have used.
If have problems just send me a message to my email:

Thank you all for taking the time to go through this. I hope some of you were interested. If not I’m sorry, I’m sure there is a rsps out there that will fit you.

Have fun and Enjoy the community.
